{"id":1268207262,"question_id":3444,"lang":"cpp","lang_name":"C++","time":"8 months, 2 weeks","timestamp":1716701275,"status":11,"status_display":"Wrong Answer","runtime":"N/A","url":"/submissions/detail/1268207262/","is_pending":"Not Pending","title":"Find the Number of Good Pairs II","memory":"N/A","code":"class Solution {\npublic:\n    long long numberOfPairs(vector<int>& nums1, vector<int>& nums2, int k) {\n        long long ans = 0;\n        vector<int> new_nums1, new_nums2;\n\n        for(int i=0; i<nums1.size(); i++) {\n            if (nums1[i]%k == 0)\n                new_nums1.push_back(abs(nums1[i]/k));\n        }\n        sort(new_nums1.begin(), new_nums1.end());\n        for(unsigned int i = 0; i < nums2.size(); i++) {\n            if(nums2[i] < 0) \n                new_nums2.push_back(-nums2[i]); //make positive.\n            else    \n                new_nums2.push_back(nums2[i]);\n        };\n\n        sort(new_nums2.begin(), new_nums2.end());\n        unordered_map<long long, bool> dict;   //<nums_i,nums_j> checked before?  \n\n\n        for(int i=0; i<new_nums1.size(); i++) {\n            if(new_nums1[i] == 0) {\n                ans += nums2.size();\n                continue;\n            }\n            \n             for(int j=0; j<new_nums2.size(); j++) {\n                if(new_nums1[i] < new_nums2[j] || new_nums2[j] == 0)\n                    break;\n                if(new_nums2[j]== 1) {\n                    ans++;\n                    break;\n                } \n                 \n                 //int mod_val = new_nums1[i] - new_nums1[i]/new_nums2[j] * new_nums2[j];\n                 long long key = new_nums1[i]*(long long)1000000+new_nums2[j];\n                 if(dict.find(key)!=dict.end()) {\n                    if( dict[key] == 1) {\n                        ans++;\n                        continue;\n                    } else {\n                        continue;\n                    }\n                 } \n                 int mod_val= new_nums1[i] - new_nums1[i]/new_nums2[j] * new_nums2[j];\n                 if(  mod_val == 0) {\n                    ans++;\n                    dict[key] = 1;  //true\n                 } else {\n                    dict[key] = 0;   //false\n                 }\n             }            \n        }\n        return ans;\n        \n    }\n};","compare_result":"","title_slug":"find-the-number-of-good-pairs-ii","has_notes":false,"flag_type":1}
